short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for searching recently closed and history tabs with navigation using arrow keys and date filters.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows:
- Quickly locate previously visited tabs in your browsing history
- Access unlimited browsing history results directly from
a compact popup (like Chrome Search Recent Tabs popup but better)
- Tailor your searches with filtering (date range)

@ Release notes

v0.0.4
- added dark mode

v0.0.3
- updated searching
